name: Love Balls Bump! Brain It On
name_original: Love Balls Bump! Brain It On
description:
Love Balls (Blue and Pink) are great lovers......
One day a Dragon kidnapped Pink Ball..Blue Ball wants his love to get back..
Love balls Have to fight with Dragon....
Can they win This Battle?
Will you Help Blue Ball to release Pink Ball from Dragon Siege?
It's time to use your brain and find a way to bump the balls!
Play Love Balls Bump!
and Leave a review if You Love this Game.
